summary.vendorDescription: Xûr comes and goes freely, his strange curios eagerly sought by adventurous Guardians.

categories.overlayDescription: "The Urn has served you well. As was the intent… As is its purpose."
"Perhaps this is why the Nine sent me here?"

1469714392.bucketDescription: Supplies and materials used in the field.

1498876634.bucketDescription: Auto rifles, pulse rifles, scout rifles, and hand cannons.

3865314626.bucketDescription: Useful for equipment upgrades and more.

211861343.itemDescription: Single-use Ghost manufacturing package. Instantly replenish heavy weapon ammunition.

417308266.itemDescription: Stackable effect that increases the chances the next Ultra you defeat or Crucible match you complete will award an Exotic Engram.

452597397.itemDescription: A remnant that almost seems to have a life of its own. Can be used to unlock the full power of Exotic gear.
452597397.displaySource: Acquired by dismantling Exotic quality gear.

937555249.itemDescription:
A brilliant spark of the Traveler's Light.

Can be consumed to apply experience to your equipped gear.
937555249.displaySource: Obtained from Weekly Heroics, Public Events and dismantling upgraded gear.

941890990.itemDescription: "The light shines brightest in those it consumes."

1503830964.itemDescription: An engram with remarkable but familiar markers. A Cryptarch would be pleased to decode it.

1738186005.itemDescription: This unusual coin is warm to the touch and vibrates gently in your hand.
1738186005.displaySource: Obtained by completing weekly challenge activities.

1880070441.itemDescription: Permanently upgrades an equipped Rare Sparrow to improve overall speed and durability.

1880070442.itemDescription:
High frequency suppression causes this drive to appear red under boost.

Permanently upgrades an equipped Rare Sparrow to improve speed and durability.

2055601062.itemDescription: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

2633085824.itemDescription:
Slivers of glassy material that appear to alter the flow of time around them.

Said to be used by the Nine to transform the properties of Exotic gear.
2633085824.displaySource: Obtained from Xûr, Agent of the Nine.

2882684153.itemDescription:
> No one has ever died wearing me. 
# It's true. She leaves the unworthy before they fall.

3574778420.itemDescription: "Fire is the breaking of bonds. Fire is freedom. We must be swift and thorough in our liberation."

144602215.statDescription:
Decreases the cooldown of your super ability.

Intellect can be increased by your Armor.

155624089.statDescription: Decreases weapon recoil when fired continuously.

368428387.statDescription: Higher Attack allows your weapons to damage higher-level opponents.

943549884.statDescription: The speed with which the weapon can be readied and aimed.

1240592695.statDescription: Increases the effective range of this weapon.

1345609583.statDescription: The weapon's ability to augment your aim.

1735777505.statDescription:
Discipline decreases the cooldown time of your grenades, allowing you to use them more often.

Find and equip armor with Discipline to boost this effect.

1931675084.statDescription: How much space the weapon occupies in the inventory.

2391494160.statDescription: Light increases your level, increasing the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

2715839340.statDescription: The weapon's tendency to move while firing.

3871231066.statDescription: The number of shots which can be fired before reloading.

3897883278.statDescription: Reduces incoming damage from your enemies.

4043523819.statDescription: Increases the damage inflicted by each round.

4188031367.statDescription: Decreases the time it takes to reload this weapon.

4244567218.statDescription:
Strength reduces the cooldown time of your melee ability, allowing you to use it more often.

Find and equip armor with Strength to boost this effect.

4284893193.statDescription: The number of shots per minute this weapon can fire.

124234431.displayDescription: Increases the amount of Hand Cannon ammunition you can carry.

448609668.displayDescription: Replenish health when you pick up an Orb.

671224739.displayDescription: Increased Armor when using a Solar-based subclass.

707792617.displayDescription: Gain bonus Super energy from melee kills on minions of the Darkness.

709737102.displayDescription: Increases the amount of Shotgun ammunition you can carry.

1101818187.displayDescription: Bonus grenade energy on Orb pickup.

1195575848.displayDescription: Gain Death from Above and Headstrong.

1228656138.displayDescription: Increases the amount of Fusion Rifle ammunition you can carry.

1269473995.displayDescription: Increases the amount of Sidearm ammunition you can carry.

1577779520.displayDescription: Increases the amount of Pulse Rifle ammunition you can carry.

1752089080.displayDescription: Increases the amount of Auto Rifle ammunition you can carry.

2131801999.displayDescription: Shields start recovery immediately after Orb pickup.

2426858846.displayDescription: Carry more ammo for Heavy Weapons.

2556279843.displayDescription: Increased Recovery for 5 seconds after taking Void splash damage.

2586594178.displayDescription: Carry more ammo for Special Weapons.

2661061678.displayDescription: More Super energy from non-Guardian kills.

2664229771.displayDescription: Gain bonus Super energy from Special Weapon kills on minions of the Darkness.

2814215427.displayDescription: This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.

Arcbolt Grenade chains further. 
Respawn with full grenade energy.

3240339843.displayDescription: Increases the amount of Scout Rifle ammunition you can carry.

4205188814.displayDescription: Dealing damage with this weapon reduces your melee cooldown and grants a chance to fully charge your melee ability with each kill.
